column4: Okay people, I just finished building my new PC, and I'm trying to decide whether to use the 64bit version of 8.10 or 32bit. I'm installing a total of 4gigs RAM, so will need 64bit for that, but can I still run 32bit software in the 64bit version, especially Windows software via wine?
Please don't flood, use http://paste.ubuntu.com to paste, don't use Enter as punctuation.
